bibl.title: The Grain Trade and the Importance of Egypt for the Economy of the Hellenistic-Roman World: Some Remarks. Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Commerce and Economy in Ancient Egypt. Proceedings of the Third International Congress for Young Egyptologists, Budapest, 25-27 september 2009.

bibl.seg: Rolandi Marco, The Grain Trade and the Importance of Egypt for the Economy of the Hellenistic-Roman World: Some Remarks. Avec résumé en anglais.
